attributes.comment:
As an adoptive parent of one child and currently in the process of adopting another
I am ashamed and astonished at my government for even thinking of increasing
the already exorborant fees for adoption paperwork. With our latest international
adoption we have already had to pay the price for approval twice since the
paperwork is only good for 18 months. That was hard enough, I can't even imagine
how we could afford such robbery if we were in need for the third process. This
increase guarantees that we will not be able to adopt again.
For each family that you discourage from adopting due to these expenses you are
risking the life of an innocent child. That is one child that will be left behind and
their lives changed forever.
I would like to hear the rationale for the enormous increase in fees when no extra
services are to be provided. It is basically extorsion--I want a family and the only
way that is going to happen is through adoption so you have me over a barrel...so
if I don't pay it--I have no family??? I just feel like my government is sticking a
knife in my back when I have already had to deal with my own bodies disloyalty
with infertility. I would love to have a conversation with the genius that thought up
these increases, they have obviously not needed or wanted to adopt a child. You
have no idea what the ramifications are if these prices go through. You are
changing the world--one child at a time, but not for the better.
I am ashamed of you all.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Jennifer Ames
